startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of Facebook Ads Library URLs to scrape directly. If provided, takes precedence over search/country/adType parameters.

search.title: Search keyword
search.description: Keyword to search for ads. Requires 'country' and 'adType' parameters.

country.title: Country
country.description: Two-letter country code (e.g. BR, US, GB, PT). Required when using 'search'.

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of ads to scrape. 0 means unlimited.

endPage.title: End page
endPage.description: Maximum number of result pages to scrape. 0 means unlimited.

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy settings. Residential proxies are strongly recommended for Facebook scraping.

customData.title: Custom data
customData.description: Free-form JSON object passed through to every output record. Useful for identifying the scrape job when chaining actors (e.g. { "search_run_id": "abc-123", "client_id": "456" }).
